sentences.en: Cell lineage The theory stating that cells arise only from pre - existing cells.
sentences.cn: 细胞谱系:该理论起始于细胞仅仅产生于已经存在的细胞.

sentences.en: Detong, add the lineage title to the index webpages.
sentences.cn: 茶桶, 将此传承标题增入到我们的首页.

sentences.en: Eventually, only a single lineage remains, which is the same as before.
sentences.cn: 最后, 只有单一的线粒体仍然存在, 那线粒体仍然与从前的一样.

sentences.en: Germ cell Any cell in a cell lineage that eventually produces gametes.
sentences.cn: 生殖细胞:是生物体所有细胞中最终能产生配子的细胞.

sentences.en: Ivor proudly traces his lineage back to the Silence.
sentences.cn: 提起自己的血统,艾弗可以骄傲的上溯到寂静时代.

sentences.en: One generation of a specific lineage.
Sebek : A Pandoran Mockery of the Osiris Lineage.
sentences.cn: 源于奥西里斯的尸祸伪系.

sentences.en: She was of ( an ) aristocratic lineage.
sentences.cn: 她 有 贵族的血统.

sentences.en: Silent , the : A Pandoran Mockery of the Galatea Lineage.
sentences.cn: 源于葛拉蒂的尸祸伪系.

sentences.en: The arts appear to have a lineage as old as human experience.
sentences.cn: 这些艺术似乎有着与人类经历同样古老的脉络和传统.

sentences.en: The heroes and heroines are of ancient and aristocratic lineage.
sentences.cn: 男女主人都是家世渊源的贵族.

sentences.en: They can trace their lineage directly back to the 18th century.
sentences.cn: 他们的世系可以直接追溯到18世纪。

sentences.en: They say, child, thou art of the lineage of the Prince of Air!
sentences.cn: 孩子, 他们都说你是‘空中王子’的后代呢!

sentences.en: This is due to their direct lineage from primitive sorcery dance.
sentences.cn: 这是由于它直接来自原始巫舞之故.

sentences.en: Torch - Born : A Pandoran Mockery of the Frankenstein Lineage.
sentences.cn: 源于弗兰肯斯坦的尸祸伪系.

trans.tran_en: the way in which members of a family are descended from other members
